DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study examines the use of electroacupuncture and laser therapy to treat chronic neck pain.
DOC.brief_title: Electroacupuncture and Laser Therapy on Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: people with chronic neck pain, participants with a VAS level between 3 and 10 will be included in the study history of cancer, tuberculosis, pacemaker usage, pregnancy, hemophilia, cardiovascular disease, osteoporosis
